import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './Start.css'; function Start() { const [candidates, setCandidates] = useState([]); // Define candidates state useEffect(() => { // Fetch candidates data from your backend API axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/candidates') // Replace with your actual API endpoint .then((response) => { setCandidates(response.data); // Update state with fetched data }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error fetching candidates:', error); }); }, []); return ( <>
